channel.title: Posts on The Etherington Group
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on The Etherington Group

item.title: New Module
item.description: (11/02/23) We have developed a new module on Quantum and Molecular Photophysics for the 3rd Year students. This is a research-led module and will give the students good opprtunity to learn about OLEDs.

item.title: New Website
item.description: (06/02/23) Welcome to the new website of the Etherington Group. Please feel free to explore and have a look around!

item.title: HORIBA Fluorolog-QM Installed
item.description: (23/07/21) The latest Fluorolog-QM from HORIBA is now installed at Northumbria University. I am looking forward to getting to grips with it.
